it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.model.game.turn

Class NullTurnDataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.model.game.turn.NullTurnDataSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionDataSource, TurnDataSource

    public class NullTurnDataSource
extends java.lang.Object
implements TurnDataSource
    A null object to allow testing and default values. All of this methods do not report to anything.
